title: Vase, n.d.
markings: Marks: In underglaze blue on bottom: "LC / 3 / 15" (Similar mark for Lambertus Cleffius - working c. 1666-1691; but this piece appears to be a later date).
provenance: S. Berges (Antiques), New York: Phelps Warren, NY (1960)
description: Double-gourd shaped body with flared mouth; underglaze blue on white with dark outlines (trek), overall design of stylized floral pattern, lambrequins at top of lower body section, leaf border top, cross-hatching on short circular foot.

tombstone.epitaph:
Vase, n.d..
n.d.. earthenware, tin glaze. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-40.
